Locally Sourced & Milled Lumber

Our mill operation can save you time and money by custom cutting lumber for your next project. We source our logs from local fire mitigations which is an environmentally friendly alternative to harvested timbers.

Blue Stain Beetle Kill $1.50 bdft
Rough Cut Pine $0.90 bdft
Custom Cuts - Boards, Dimensional & Beams
Great for - Furniture, Siding, Trim, fencing, dunnage, etc.

Reclaimed Barn Wood Siding

This True Reclaimed Barn Wood siding is the real deal. This wood has stood the test of time and has a rich color, texture, and history that can’t be matched. This product is perfect if you want to stand apart from the crowd in look and authenticity. See below for what's currently in the shop.

Price $6.00
Rear face surfaced + $0.20 sqft
Straight line ripped + $0.45 sqft
Harrison Valley, PA Barn – Gray & Natural
This barn from Harrison Valley, PA was raised in 1841 and served as a family dairy barn. This siding is 1” in depth and 12” wide in various lengths from 8’-16’.
West Almond, NY Barn – Red and Natural
This barn from West Almond, NY was built in 1860 and was at one point the biggest barn in Allegany County that housed award winning Clydesdales. This siding is 1” in depth and 12” wide in various lengths from 8’ – 16’

Dimensional Reclaimed Barn Wood

Here at True Reclaimed we have some folks that love to build and this is by far their favorite material to build with. From the wormy hardwood 2” material to the specialty resawn beams, this old wood has some real character and charm. Final products made with this material never seem to cease amazing people.

Good for - Mantels, Counters, Stair Treads, Table Tops, Furniture, Accents, etc.
Resawn Beams - Cut To Order
Oak & Beech $12.50 bdft
Fir, Hemlock & Pine $11.00 bdft
Original Barn Wood Flooring
2" x 6" Sycamore, Beech and Hickory $6.00

Reclaimed Beams

Can you imagine cutting and shaping 40 oak trees by hand and then building your barn out of it? We sure couldn’t, but it’s pretty exciting to be a part of preserving all the timber and hard work that went into building these barns before 1840.

We have an assortment of hand hewn and circle sawn hardwood and softwood timbers. If you have a specific project with specific reclaimed wood needs, let us know. If we don’t have it in our yard, we’ll find the barn that has what you need and bring it out to Colorado.

We offer a various assortment of hand hewn and circle sawn softwood and hardwood beams.
Call for specific dimensions.
Price $6.00 bdft
